dmca.title: DMCA Take Down Notice
dmca.body:
Subject:   	FW: DMCA Take Down Notice
From:   	"George Poletes" <gpoletes@theplanet.com>
Date:   	Tue, October 12, 2004 12:03 pm
To:   	Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
Options:   	View Full Header |  View Printable Version  | Download this as a file | Whitelist Sender  | View as HTML | Add to Addressbook

 

 

-----Original Message-----
From: tony@cyberlawyer.com [mailto:tony@cyberlawyer.com] 
Sent: Monday, October 04, 2004 4:34 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Anthony DeGidio
Subject: DMCA Take Down Notice

 

Attention Mr. Lance Crosby, Esq.,

 

Please see attached Take Down Notice

=====
Sincerely,

 

Anthony J. DeGidio Esq.
3738 Treelawn Dr.
Toledo, Ohio
419-382-9590 (Voice)
419-382-9592 (Fax)
E-Mail: tony@cyberlawyer.com
 _________________________________
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE
This message is privileged and confidential and is intended only for the use
of the individual or entity to which it is addressed.  The information is
private and protected by law.  If the reader of this message is not the
intended recipient, or the employee or agent responsible for delivering the
message to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any
dissemination, distribution or copying of this message or the taking of any
action in reliance on the contents of this information is strictly
prohibited.  If you have received this communication in error, please notify
me by e-mail or telephone and destroy any copies of this communication.
dmca.sender_name: Law Office of Anthony J. DeGidio
